reservations.policy: Reservations recommended for parties of 4 or more. Walk-ins welcome based on availability.
reservations.large_parties: Parties of 8+ require a deposit and may have gratuity added. Private dining available for 12+.

cancellation.policy: 24-hour cancellation notice preferred. Same-day cancellations may incur a fee.
cancellation.no_show_policy: No-show reservations may be charged a $25 fee per person

dress_code.restrictions: No shorts, flip-flops, or athletic wear for dinner service
dress_code.recommendations: Collared shirts and closed-toe shoes recommended for evening dining

children.policy: Children welcome. High chairs and kids menu available.

pets.policy: Service animals welcome. Outdoor seating allows well-behaved leashed pets.
pets.restrictions: Indoor dining restricted to service animals only

accessibility.policy: Fully wheelchair accessible. Braille menus and large print menus available.
accessibility.features: Accessible restrooms, ramp entrance, accessible parking spaces

payment.accepted: All major credit cards, cash, and digital payments. Split bills welcome.
payment.gratuity: Gratuity automatically added to parties of 8 or more

alcohol.corkage: $25 corkage fee for wine. Maximum 2 bottles per table.
alcohol.policy: Valid ID required. We reserve the right to refuse service

parking.valet: Available evenings, complimentary with dinner reservations

atmosphere.description: Romantic lighting, live jazz on weekends, family-friendly until 8 PM

private_dining.features: Private dining room with AV capabilities
